%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
\newcommand{\lyxmathsym}[1]{\ifmmode\begingroup\def\b@ld{bold}
  \text{\ifx\math@version\b@ld\bfseries\fi#1}\endgroup\else#1\fi}

%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}
%% A simple dot to overcome graphicx limitations
\newcommand{\lyxdot}{.}


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% Textclass specific LaTeX commands.
\numberwithin{equation}{section}
\numberwithin{figure}{section}
\newenvironment{lyxlist}[1]
{\begin{list}{}
{\settowidth{\labelwidth}{#1}
 \setlength{\leftmargin}{\labelwidth}
 \addtolength{\leftmargin}{\labelsep}
 \renewcommand{\makelabel}[1]{##1\hfil}}}
{\end{list}}

\def\ScaleIfNeeded{%
	\ifdim\Gin@nat@height> 0.9\textheight
		0.9\textheight
	\else
		\Gin@nat@height
	\fi
}

\def\ConstForImageWidth{13cm}


\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}

\title{Analysis of Experiment --experimentname--}


\author{Research Group Image Analysis\\ \\ IPK-Gatersleben\\ \\ C. Klukas \& A. Entzian}


\date{29.09.2011}


\address{Leibniz Institute of Plant Genetics and Crop Plant Research, Group
Image Analysis, Corrensstr. 3, 06466 Gatersleben, Germany}


\email{klukas@ipk-gatersleben.de, entzian@ipk-gatersleben.de}


\urladdr{http://ba-13.ipk-gatersleben.de}
\begin{abstract}
This document is automatically created based on the automated image analysis performed 
inside the integrated analysis platform IAP. Currently the pipelines and data analysis tools are in beta status, 
which means that we are working on makeing the analysis procedures, statistical operations, diagram output and report
generation more stable and suitable to the needs of any user of the automated imaging infrastructure at the IPK.

If you have any hints, comments or suggestions for improvements, please don't hesitate to contact any member
of the group image analysis.
\end{abstract}

\keywords{image analysis, phenotyping, maize }

\maketitle

\section{\noindent Weight and water consumption}

\subsection{Weights (before and after watering)}
\begin{itemize}
\item Weight before and after watering.
\item Colnum name: Weight A (g), Weight B (g)
\item Unit: g
\end{itemize}
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"Weight\lyxdot A\lyxdot \lyxdot g\lyxdot \string"}}]~
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"Weight\lyxdot B\lyxdot \lyxdot g\lyxdot \string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}

\subsection{Watering amounts / consumption}
\begin{itemize}
\item Consumption of water based of weight measurments.
\item Colnum name: Watering (weight-diff)
\item Unit: g\end{itemize}
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"Water\lyxdot \lyxdot weight\lyxdot diff\lyxdot \string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}

\clearpage
\section{\noindent Biomass}
\begin{itemize}
\item Digital Biomass based on the side.area and top.area
\item Unit: pixel\textthreesuperior{}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{IAP based formula - GRB}
\begin{itemize}
\item Equation: $Biomass_{IAP}=\sqrt{side.area_{average}^{2}*top.area_{average}}$
\item Column name: volume.iap
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"volume\lyxdot iap\lyxdot \lyxdot px3\lyxdot \string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{IAP based formula - GRB max}
\begin{itemize}
\item Equation: $Biomass_{LemnaTec}=\sqrt{side.area_{max\_image}^{2}*top.area_{max\_image}}$
\item Column name: volume.iap\_max
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"volume\lyxdot iap_max\string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{IAP based formula - FLUO}
\begin{itemize}
\item Equation: $Biomass_{IAP}=\sqrt{side.area_{average}^{2}*top.area_{average}}$
\item Column name: volume.fluo.iap
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"volume\lyxdot fluo\lyxdot iap\string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{LemnaTec formula}
\begin{itemize}
\item Equation: $Biomass_{LemnaTec}=\sqrt{side.area_{0^{\circ}}*side.area_{90^{\circ}}*top.area}$
\item Column name: volume.lt
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"volume\lyxdot lt\lyxdot \lyxdot px3\lyxdot \string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{KeyGene formula}
\begin{itemize}
\item Equation: $Biomass_{KeyGene}=side.area_{0^{\circ}}+side.area_{90^{\circ}}+\log(\frac{top.area}{3})$
\item Column name: digital.biomass.keygene.norm
%\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
%\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{digital\lyxdot biomass\lyxdot keygene\lyxdot norm}}]~
%\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\clearpage
\section{\noindent Water use efficiency}
\begin{itemize}
\item Ratio of plant growth and water use.
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Volume based}
\begin{itemize}
\item The volume based on the IAP formula used for the value "plant growth".
\item Colnum name: volume.iap.wue
\item Unit: xxx
\end{itemize}
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"volume\lyxdot iap\lyxdot wue\string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}

\section{General growth related plant properties}

\subsection{Plant height}
\begin{itemize}
\item Plant height (mm) (normalized to distance of left and right marker)
\item Column name: side.height.norm
\item Unit: mm
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"side\lyxdot height\lyxdot norm\lyxdot \lyxdot mm\lyxdot \string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Plant width}
\begin{itemize}
\item Plant width (mm) (normalized to distance of left and right marker) 
\item Column name: side.width.norm
\item Unit: mm
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"side\lyxdot width\lyxdot norm\lyxdot \lyxdot mm\lyxdot \string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Projected side area}
\begin{itemize}
\item Number of foreground pixels from side camera
\item Colum name: side.area.norm
\item Unit: pixel\texttwosuperior{}
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"side\lyxdot area\lyxdot norm\lyxdot \lyxdot mm2\lyxdot \string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Projected top area}
\begin{itemize}
\item Number of foreground pixels from top camera
\item Colum name: top.area.norm
\item Unit: pixel\texttwosuperior{}
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"top\lyxdot area\lyxdot norm\lyxdot \lyxdot mm2\lyxdot \string"}}]~

\clearpage
\section{Fluorescence intensity analysis}

\subsection{Chlorophyl intensity}
\begin{itemize}
\item Average activity of chlorophyl, based on red reflection.
\item The darker the higher acitivity
\item Column name: side.fluo.intensity.chlorophyl.average (relative)
\item Unit: relative intensity/pixel
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"side\lyxdot fluo\lyxdot intensity\lyxdot chlorophyl\lyxdot average\lyxdot \lyxdot relative\lyxdot \string"}}]~
\include{side\lyxdot fluo\lyxdot normalized\lyxdot histogram\lyxdot bin\lyxdot 1\lyxdot 0_25;side\lyxdot fluo\lyxdot normalized\lyxdot histogr}
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Phenols and other fluorescence intensity}
\begin{itemize}
\item Average activity without chlorohyll (e. g. phenol), based of yellow
reflection.
\item The darker the higher acitivity
\item Column name: side.fluo.intensity.phenol.average
\item Unit: relative intensity/pixel
%\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
%\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"side\lyxdot fluo\lyxdot intensity\lyxdot phenol\lyxdot average\string"}}]~
%\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Near-infrared intensity}
\begin{itemize}
\item Average intensity of near infrared (NIR)
\item Represents the water content of the plant
\item Column name: side.nir.intensity.average
\item Unit: relative intensity/pixel
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"side\lyxdot nir\lyxdot intensity\lyxdot average\lyxdot \lyxdot relative\lyxdot \string"}}]~
\include{side\lyxdot nir\lyxdot normalized\lyxdot histogram\lyxdot bin\lyxdot 1\lyxdot 0_25;side\lyxdot nir\lyxdot normalized\lyxdot histogram}
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\clearpage
\section{Plant structures}

\subsection{Number of leafs}
\begin{itemize}
\item Number of leafs-tips
\item Colum name: side.leaf.count.median
\item Unit: leafs
\item Hint: leaf-tips are shown as red retangles in the image
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"side\lyxdot leaf\lyxdot count\lyxdot median\lyxdot \lyxdot leafs\lyxdot \string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Tassel (for maize plants)}
\begin{itemize}
\item Male flower count
\item Colum name: side.bloom.count
\item Unit: tassel
\item Hint: the number of blue retangles in the image
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"side\lyxdot bloom\lyxdot count\lyxdot \lyxdot tassel\lyxdot \string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Leaf lengths}
\begin{itemize}
\item Length of all leafs plus stem
\item Column name: side.leaf.length.sum.norm.max
\item Unit: mm
\item Hint: the yellow line in the image
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"side\lyxdot leaf\lyxdot length\lyxdot sum\lyxdot norm\lyxdot max\lyxdot \lyxdot mm\lyxdot \string"}}]~\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\clearpage
\section{\noindent Wetness}
\begin{itemize}
\item Vales based on the NIR images
\item Unit: xxx
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Average wetness of side image}
\begin{itemize}
\item Average wetness of the plants from NIR side camera
\item Column name: side.nir.wetness.av
\item Unit: xxx
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"side\lyxdot nir\lyxdot wetness\lyxdot av\string"}}]~\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Average wetness of top image}
\begin{itemize}
\item Average wetness of the plants from NIR top camera
\item Column name: top.nir.wetness.av
\item Unit: xxx
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"top\lyxdot nir\lyxdot wetness\lyxdot av\string"}}]~\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Weighted loss through drought stress - side image}
\begin{itemize}
\item Number of foreground pixels from NIR side camera minus the weighted value of the plant
\item weightOfPlant = fully wet: 1 unit, fully dry: 1/7 unit
\item Column name: side.nir.wetness.plant\_weight\_drought\_loss
\item Unit: xxx
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"side\lyxdot nir\lyxdot wetness\lyxdot plant_weight_drought_loss\string"}}]~\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Weighted loss through drought stress - top image}
\begin{itemize}
\item Number of foreground pixels from NIR top camera minus the weighted value of the plant
\item weightOfPlant = fully wet: 1 unit, fully dry: 1/7 unit
\item Column name: top.nir.wetness.plant\_weight\_drought\_loss
\item Unit: xxx
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[height=\ScaleIfNeeded,width=\ConstForImageWidth, keepaspectratio]{\string"top\lyxdot nir\lyxdot wetness\lyxdot plant_weight_drought_loss\string"}}]~\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}
